history.narrative: Law 13-304, the “Bail Reform Temporary Act of 2000”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-786. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 11, 2000, and October 3, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 17, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-443 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-304 became effective on June 8, 2001.
